data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Ramon de Carranza have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Santiago Jaime Latre, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 2, Getafe to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards Cadiz a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cadiz.
In the minute 7, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Cadiz.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Getafe at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Getafe throw-in in Cadiz's half.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
In the minute 12, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
Goal kick for Getafe at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
In the minute 18, Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Getafe.
Cucho Hernandez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Getafe.
In the minute 22, In Cadiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Juan Cala (Cadiz) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 24, Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Ball safe as Cadiz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Santiago Jaime Latre awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Cadiz.
Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Getafe.
In the minute 30, Cadiz are caught offside.
Throw-in for Cadiz close to the penalty box.
Cucho Hernandez puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 33, Marc Cucurella with an assist there.
Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Getafe.
Free kick Cadiz.
In the minute 36, Cadiz's Alvaro Negredo breaks free at Estadio Ramon de Carranza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Cadiz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Cadiz.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Cadiz close to the penalty box.
In the minute 39, At Estadio Ramon de Carranza, Cucho Hernandez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Marc Cucurella is booked for the away team.
Free kick Cadiz.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Jairo Izquierdo is back on his feet again.
Getafe have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Jairo Izquierdo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Getafe.
In the minute 47, Cadiz needs to be cautious. Getafe have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 51, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
Cadiz's Alberto Perea gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Ramon de Carranza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Getafe pushes forward through Angel Rodriguez, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 54, Play has been interrupted briefly in Cadiz to check on Mauro Arambarri, who is grimacing with pain.
Getafe's Mauro Arambarri looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Angel Rodriguez (Getafe) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 56, Getafe have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
In Cadiz Getafe attack through Marc Cucurella. The finish is off target, however.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, In Cadiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Erick Cabaco (Getafe) has received a first yellow card.
Cadiz are coming forward and Isaac Carcelen gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
Throw-in for Cadiz at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Free kick for Getafe in the half of Cadiz.
In the minute 62, Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Getafe.
Getafe are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Allan Nyom (Getafe) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in high up the field for Cadiz in Cadiz.
In the minute 66, Can Cadiz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
Anthony Lozano is on a sub for Alvaro Negredo for Cadiz.
Cadiz make their second substitution with Fali replacing Alfonso Espino.
In the minute 67, Alvaro Cervera is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Ramon de Carranza with Alvaro Gimenez replacing Salvi Sanchez.
Can Getafe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cadiz's half?
Santiago Jaime Latre awards Cadiz a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Free kick Cadiz.
Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a throw-in for Cadiz, close to Getafe's area.
In the minute 71, Cadiz have a dangerous throw-in.
Santiago Jaime Latre waits before resuming play because Erick Cabaco for Getafe is still down.
Getafe’s Erick Cabaco is on his feet again at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
In the minute 73, Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team have replaced Angel Rodriguez with Enes Ünal. This is the first substitution made today by Pepe Bordalas.
Mathias Olivera for Getafe has been booked by Santiago Jaime Latre and receives a first yellow card.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Cadiz throw-in in Getafe's half.
In the minute 76, Cadiz are whistled for offside.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Cadiz at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Cadiz.
In Cadiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 82, David Timor is replacing Cucho Hernandez for Getafe at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
At Estadio Ramon de Carranza, Cadiz are penalized for being offside.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 86, Cadiz's Alberto Perea gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Getafe defender.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Cadiz to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
In the minute 88, Goal kick for Cadiz at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Anthony Lozano (Cadiz) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cadiz.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 89, Filip Malbasic is replacing Alex for the home team.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Getafe.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Can Getafe capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Ruben Yanez (Getafe) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Getafe extend their lead to 0-2 through Nemanja Maksimovic.
Allan Nyom instrumental with a fine assist.
